bill.title: Low-speed and medium-speed electrical vehicles; authorize use of on certain public roads and streets.
bill.description: An Act To Allow Counties And Municipalities To Authorize The Operation Of Low-speed Electrical Vehicles And Medium-speed Electrical Vehicles, Where They Can Be Safely Operated, On Certain Public Roads And Streets; To Provide For The Hours During Which Those Vehicles May Be Operated; To Allow Certain Governmental Entities To Grant An Exemption To Hours Of Operation Provided That Those Vehicles Are Equipped With Certain Safety Features; To Allow The Department Of Transportation To Prohibit The Operation Of Those Vehicles On Roads Under Its Jurisdiction In The Interest Of Safety; To Require Persons Operating Those Vehicles To Have A Valid Driver's License Or Temporary Driver's Permit; To Amend Sections 63-1-7, 63-3-103, 27-19-3, 27-19-48, 27-19-56 And 27-51-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity With The Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.
